item.title: How to create stunning presentations using Reveal.js in R
item.description: I recently found out about an R package that allows you to create Reveal.js presentations in R using RMarkdown syntax. If you are like me and love to display cool graphs in your slides, don’t miss this short tutorial! Why you need to start using Reveal.js in R Okay, so you already know how to use PowerPoint. Why using something different then? ðŸ¤” There are many reasons, actually, but one of them is that PowerPoint doesn’t allow you to display interactive graphs in your presentation.
